item.description:
Are you new to our meetup group or have not yet had a chance to attend one of our events? Or are you new in town or recently moved back? Then join us for a casual evening to meet other asian professionals in our group. Of course all members new & old are welcome to this event.

Mixer 7 - 8 pm (appetizers served compliments of our Asian Meetup group). This is a friendly, casual atmosphere to relax and meet some new people. There are no introductions or presentations, only an unstructured opportunity to mix and mingle. Our organizers will be on hand also to answer any questions. We have reserved the private room for our group and will be able to acccomodate about 48 people. Dinner will start around 8pm. BuddaC our current sponsor will be giving us a 10 % discount off our bill. :)

RSVP, don't miss out.

How to get there: take the C train (Green line to corner of Beacon St. & St. Paul St.)

Parking Meters are available along the street and along the T tracks.

 

Please check out the following link for menu:
http://www.buddac.com...
item.how_to_find_us: We have their private function room reserved
item.why: The snow is gone and spring has arrived. Join us for good food and conversation and appetizers during the mixer compliments of Boston Asian Meetup. Time to get out of the house! :D

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Welcome New Members @ BuddaC (mixer & dinner)
